name: The user as a client of plazavea tries to buy an item on the web page

testSteps.description: The user as a client of plazavea tries to buy an item on the web page #1: {id=1, category=Tecnología, productName=Smartphone XIAOMI Redmi 7 6.26" 32GB 12MP + 2MP Negro, quantity=QUANT, price=799.00, expectedResponse=El producto se agrego al carrito}

children.description:
Given User searchs the product he wants to buy on plazavea web page
| 1 | Tecnología | Smartphone XIAOMI Redmi 7 6.26" 32GB 12MP + 2MP Negro | QUANT | 799.00 | El producto se agrego al carrito |
Sophos solution clicks on The search bar at tyhe top of the page
Sophos solution enters 'Smartphone XIAOMI Redmi 7 6.26" 32GB 12MP + 2MP Negro' into The search bar at tyhe top of the page
When he selects an item to add in the shopping cart
Sophos solution clicks on label that redirects to product details
Sophos solution clicks on button that add the product to shopping cart
Then he verifies that the item selected was added to the shopping cart successful
Then he verifies that the item selected was added to the shopping cart successful
Sophos solution clicks on alert that appears when the product is added to shopping cart
Sophos solution clicks on Continue to view the product details
